mapper.insert: insert into recyclelife (member_id, recycleLife_title, recycleLife_content, recycleLife_views, recycleLife_likes, recycleLife_img, recycleLife_wdate) values (#{member_id}, #{recycleLife_title}, #{recycleLife_content}, #{recycleLife_views}, #{recycleLife_likes}, #{recycleLife_img}, NOW())
mapper.update: update recyclelife set recycleLife_title=#{recycleLife_title}, recycleLife_content=#{recycleLife_content}, recycleLife_img=#{recycleLife_img} where recycleLife_num=#{recycleLife_num}
mapper.select: select * from recyclelife order by recycleLife_num desc
select * from recyclelife order by recycleLife_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageBlock}
select recycleLife_likes from recyclelife where recycleLife_num = #{recycleLife_num}
